commitResults.messageTitle: Implement level-0. Rename chatbot to Monika.
Implement level-1: Update greeting, add echo and conditional exit features
commitResults.messageBody:
- Add echo feature of Level 1.
- Add randomized greeting feature which picks among 20 adapted scripts from the mod "Monika After Story".
- Change exit condition to user input "bye".

commitResults.messageTitle: Level-2: add list feature, optimize command logic
commitResults.messageBody:
-Add list feature which records any non empty input to a new TaskMgr (Task Manager ADT).
-Add Task and TaskMgr Classes, reserved marking feature for Level-3 updates.
-Input of length 0 or purely spaces are handled.

commitResults.messageTitle: Level-4: add 3 specific tasks, remove switch case conditions by tokens length, add more potential error treatments
